divs: Sighting DetailsThe witness, a 41 year old male, was outside smoking when he noted a low flying object moving from the southwest to a northeast direction. He described it as being a triangle shape with no lights visible and no sound heard. He estimated it as flying at about 500to 1,000 feet altitude and it appeared to be doing a ���flipping motion���. He is certain it was no conventional aircraft. The duration was brief, 30-45 seconds, and then it vanished from his sight.
trends: There have been 11 other sightings in Mishawaka
